column4: first, are you sure pulse audio is installed... sudo apt-get install pulse-audio
if it tells you you need to install gnome-media, install gnome-media
just gstreamer-properties   if it tells you you need gnome-media, install gnome-media
you should have had a window open up
the use of 'sudo' or not is hardly the issue here. Just adds to the confusion.
thats why i said not to use it
lol, now that would be a kick int he junk
i think !awesome should trigger the Lubuntu factoid
might look into that. Don't like Unity, Gnome or KDE a lot.
it is really, really slick, and fast... i don't wannna get offtopic, but join #lubuntu if you want.
has a Windows look to it, no?
ah.. i guess sort of.. it has a menu thats kinda windows 'esque
does it use the gnome applications?
sure, if you want to install them. (ive got a few gnome apps installed) but its based on Openbox....
